0.1.name: wordpress/advanced-search-widget
0.1.description:
The Advanced Search Widget is designed to be a replacement to the defaut search widget. The Advanced Search Widget allows you to search for only a specific post type and also select which fields to query (title, content, tags).

In addition, it is also possible to place multiple widgets onto the sidebar to search through different custom post types.
